subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Kenenisa Bekele of Ethiopia is the first man to complete the distance double at the Olympics in 28 years, winning the 5,000 meters Saturday night, six days after capturing the 10,000.
snippet: Kenenisa Bekele of Ethiopia is the first man to complete the distance double at the Olympics in 28 years, winning the 5,000 meters Saturday night, six days after capturing the 10,000.
